name: Server Reset
description:
An alien force has corrupted the guardians with a virus. You must save the town's people by resetting all of the servers to cure the corrupted guardians.

"Turn It Off And On Again" themed jam game made in three days. Created back in 2017.

The web version has numerous issues; the executable version is recommended.

Created with GameMaker Studio 1.4. Source code on Github.

Troubleshooting
  • You must touch the server to interact with it.
  • Chests can be opened by smashing them with a hammer.

These issues shouldn't be a problem with a better design. Feedback is welcomed!

Cheat codes
  • F1: main menu
  • F2: unlock all abilities
  • F3: set health to ten
  • F4: skip level
  • F5: go to level 1
  • F6: go to level 2
  • F7: go to level 3
